notes:
• Due to the long distances covered on this event, the car had twin fuel tanks in the boot, these are faithfully reproduced with twin filler caps,set into the boot lid
• Front mounted “roo bar”, with the correct number of Cibie spotlmaps mounted on it (Only 3)
• Water deflector monted below the front bumper.
• Rear mounted brackets to allow filling of the fuel tanks, and to help extract the car from mud holes.
